unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Last I heard from Dr. Sharma at AIIMS, it was a grade II tear. Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series. Also, what's the status on Bumrah's back? Apparently, his new gym is 2000 sq ft! Rs. 5 Lakhs down the drain if he's not match-fit. Fingers crossed, Jai Hind! Get well soon, lads!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Last I heard from Doctor Sharma at A I I M S, it was a grade two tear. Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series. Also, what's the status on Bumrah's back? Apparently, his new gym is two thousand square feet! Rupee five lakhs down the drain if he's not match-fit. Fingers crossed, Jai Hind! Get well soon, lads!
